name: Pho
description: A traditional Vietnamese soup consisting of broth, rice noodles, herbs, and meat, usually beef or chicken.

name: Banh Mi
description: A Vietnamese sandwich made with a crispy baguette, filled with various ingredients like meat, pickled vegetables, cilantro, and chili.

name: Spring Rolls
description: Fresh spring rolls made with rice paper, shrimp, pork, fresh herbs, and vermicelli, served with a dipping sauce.

name: Bun Cha
description: A dish of grilled pork served over a plate of white rice noodles and herbs with a side of dipping sauce.
ingredients: Dipping sauce (typically fish sauce, vinegar, sugar, and lime)

name: Banh Xeo
description: Vietnamese savory pancakes made with rice flour, water, and turmeric powder, stuffed with pork, shrimp, and bean sprouts.

name: Cao Lau
description: A regional Vietnamese noodle dish from the town of Hội An, consisting of noodles, pork, greens, and crispy rice paper.

name: Com Tam
description: Broken rice typically served with grilled pork, egg, and a variety of other toppings.

name: Hue Beef Noodle Soup
description: A spicy beef noodle soup from the city of Huế, featuring rice vermicelli and beef, and flavored with lemongrass.

name: Che
description: A sweet dessert soup or pudding made with various ingredients like beans, rice, fruits, and coconut milk.
ingredients: Sweetened beans (mung beans or red beans)
